frame_step: (float) How long should the thing output data in seconds? (Default: 0.25s; 4 times per second).
out_source_types.ROS: Prints everything to the command, basically.
out_source_types.SQL: Saves everything to an SQL server.
out_source_types.CSV: Saves everything to a local CSV file.
out_source_types.MON: Saves everything to a MongoDB server.
